text: Johannes Baptist Kerner (born 9 December 1964) is a German personality. He is best known as a sportscaster. Kerner was main host for all games broadcast by ZDF during the FIFA World Cup 2006 in Germany in front of a large live audience in Berlin. Kerner tested positive for COVID-19 in March 2020. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bonn Category:German television presenters
title: Johannes B. Kerner
